algorithm:
The new algorithm assigns scores to the bins based on the ratio of the remaining capacity of each bin to the maximum capacity, multiplied by the logarithm of the item size, and subtracts the logarithm of the sum of the remaining capacities of all the bins.

Here is the modified code:

```
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    max_capacity = np.max(bins)
    rest_capacity = max_capacity - bins
    rest_capacity_sum = np.sum(rest_capacity)
    scores = (rest_capacity / max_capacity) * np.log(item) - np.log(rest_capacity_sum)
    return scores
